summary: In 2199, the crew of the space battleship Yamato embark on a dangerous journey to the planet Iskandar to acquire a device that will rejuvenate the war-ravaged Earth.
cast: Takuya Kimura|Meisa Kuroki|Toshirô Yanagiba|Naoto Ogata|Hiroyuki Ikeuchi|Shin'ichi Tsutsumi|Maiko|Reiko Takashima|Toshiyuki Nishida|Toshihiro Yashiba|Kazuki Namioka|Takumi Saitoh|Takahiro Miura|Kensuke Ohwada|Kana Harada|Junpei Uto|Saaya Ishikawa|Seiji Hino|Ippei Sasaki|Miyû Sawai|Bunki Sugiura|Natsuhi Ueno|Yûichirô Hirose|Megumi Shôji|Ryohei Aoki|Yosuke Asari|Yumiko Fujita|Isao Hashizume|Masatô Ibu|Ebizô Ichikawa|Kisuke Iida|Teruyuki Kagawa|Keisuke Kamimura|Kazuki Kitamura|Hironori Koyama|Marika Matsumoto|Keisuke Minami|Jun Mizukami|Kenji Motomiya|Kazuki Muramatsu|Satoshi Nikaido|Shunsuke Oe|Ken'ichi Ogata|Mae Otsuka|Misaki Saijô|Isao Sasaki|Kenta Suga|Tetta Sugimoto|Kôichirô Takami|Moe Tanaka|Yoji Tanaka|Takeru Taniyama|Madoka Terukina|Miyuki Ueda|Maki Yamabayashi|Masato Yamaguchi|Tsutomu Yamazaki|Tôshi Yanagi
title: Space Battleship Yamato
